img_above_text:
Follow the path to the peak, where you'll come to the Return Path Keeper's Shrine.
## Return Path
img_below_text:
Continue up the path, where you'll have to face off against numerous soldiers along the way. This is really just a chance for you to test the power of Jingubang, and pick up some extra Will and Sparks.
![Water Curtain Cave Walkthrough \(12\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/12/Water_Curtain_Cave_Walkthrough_%2812%29.png)

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, rocky path illuminated by beams of light and lightning, with several armored soldiers positioned along the way. This scene is part of a walkthrough for the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a challenging segment where the player must face numerous enemies. The context suggests this is an opportunity for players to test the power of the Jingubang weapon and collect additional resources like Will and Sparks.
